name: FoxyGame
description:
This is a small game i build, learning visual coding 
move with arrows or wasd
jump with space
menu on the top left (use mouse to open)
this game still a bit more work on the levels and some work on the design (example levels 4 and  5 are a bit too dark)
will try to get all of those and more as i learn more, might add a 0.2 soon enough but for now will focus on the next step of my studies but would love to learn what every one thinks of this small game

(extra info)
J. is the smoll fox
